  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Extracting a Metal from its Ore</string>
            <string language="es">Extracción de un metal de su mineral</string>
            <string language="ga">Miotal a bhaint óna Mhian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Extrahieren eines Metalls von seinem Erz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Extraire un métal à partir de son minerai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Extraindo um metal de seu minério</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Estraendo un metallo dal relativo minerale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξαγωγή ενός μετάλλου από το μετάλλευμά του</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Detailed instructions for conducting an experiment involving the extraction of copper from malachite (copper carbonate). Includes teacher notes and solutions to questions.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones detalladas para realizar un experimento que conlleve la extracción del cobre de la malaquita (carbonato de cobre). Incluye notas para los profesores y soluciones a preguntas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha sonracha i gcomhair turgnamh a dhéanamh ag baint copair ó mhalaicít (carbónáit chopair). Áirítear nótaí do mhúinteoirí agus freagraí ar cheisteanna leis seo.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausführliche Anweisungen für das Leiten eines 
Experimentes, welches die Extraktion des Kupfers vom Malachit mit 
einbezieht (kupfernes Karbonat). Schließt Lehreranmerkungen und
-lösungen zu den Fragen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions détaillées pour entreprendre une 
expérience impliquant l'extraction du cuivre de la malachite 
(carbonate de cuivre). Inclut des notes et des solutions de 
professeur aux questions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções detalhadas para conduzir uma 
experiência que envolve a extração do cobre do malachite (carbonato
de cobre). Inclui notas e soluções do professor às perguntas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni dettagliate per eseguire un esperimento 
che coinvolge l'estrazione di rame da malachite (carbonato di rame). 
Include le note e le soluzioni dell'insegnante alle domande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτομερείς οδηγίες για να πραγματοποιήσει ένα 
πείραμα που περιλαμβάνει την εξαγωγή του χαλκού από malachite 
(ανθρακικό άλας χαλκού). Περιλαμβάνει τις σημειώσεις και 
τις λύσεις δασκάλων στις ερωτήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
